PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Appstract Labs (‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúour,‚Äù or ‚Äúus‚Äù) respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website, applications, or services (collectively, the ‚ÄúServices‚Äù). If you do not agree with the terms, discontinue use of our Services.

1.heading: 1. Information We Collect
b_items: Usage data, such as pages visited and time spent

2.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Providing and maintaining our Services
Processing payments and invoices
Communicating with you about updates or support
Improving website functionality and user experience
Ensuring security and fraud prevention
Complying with legal obligations

3.heading: 3. How We Share Information
3.intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share data only in these cases:
items: With trusted service providers who perform services on our behalf (e.g., hosting, payment processing)
To comply with legal requirements, court orders, or enforce our agreements
In case of a merger, acquisition, or sale of company assets

4.heading: 4. Cookies and Tracking
4.text: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features of the Services may not function properly.

5.heading: 5. Data Retention
5.text: We retain personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

6.heading: 6. Data Security
6.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

7.heading: 7. Your Rights
7.intro: Depending on your location, you may have rights including:
items: Accessing the personal information we hold about you
Requesting correction or deletion of your data
Objecting to or restricting data processing
Requesting data portability
7.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: support@appstractlabs.com.

8.heading: 8. International Data Transfers
8.text: If you access our Services outside of El Salvador üá∏üáª, your information may be transferred and processed in countries with different data protection laws.

9.heading: 9. Children‚Äôs Privacy
9.text: Our Services are not directed to children under 15 (or the applicable age of consent in your jurisdiction). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

10.heading: 10. Third-Party Links
10.text: Our Services may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of those websites.

11.heading: 11. Changes to This Policy
11.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated ‚ÄúLast updated‚Äù date.

12.heading: 12. Contact Us
12.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, contact us at:

TermsService.title: Terms of Service
TermsService.intro: Welcome to Appstract Labs. By accessing or using our website, applications, or services (collectively, the "Services"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree, you must not use our Services.

1.heading: 1. Use of Services
items: You must be at least 18 years old or the age of majority in your jurisdiction to use our Services.
You agree to use the Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

2.heading: 2. Intellectual Property
items: All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property provided through the Services are owned by or licensed to Appstract Labs.
You may not copy, modify, distribute, or exploit any content without our prior written consent.

3.heading: 3. Payments and Billing
items: If you purchase Services from us, you agree to provide accurate billing information and authorize us (or our payment processors) to charge your payment method.
Fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated.

4.heading: 4. Prohibited Activities
items: Use the Services for fraudulent, abusive, or unlawful purposes.
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or networks.
Interfere with the security or functionality of the Services.

5.heading: 5. Third-Party Services
5.text: Our Services may include links or integrations with third-party services. We are not responsible for third-party content, policies, or practices.

6.heading: 6. Disclaimers
items: The Services are provided "as is" and "as available."
We make no warranties regarding accuracy, reliability, or availability.

7.heading: 7. Limitation of Liability
7.text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Appstract Labs is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Services.

8.heading: 8. Indemnification
8.text: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Appstract Labs from claims, damages, or expenses resulting from your use of the Services or violation of these Terms.

9.heading: 9. Termination
9.text: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Services at any time, without notice, if we reasonably believe you violated these Terms.

10.heading: 10. Governing Law
10.text: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of El Salvador, without regard to conflict of law principles.

11.heading: 11. Changes to Terms
11.text: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the Services after changes are posted means you accept the revised Terms.

12.heading: 12. Contact Us
12.intro: If you have questions about these Terms, contact us at:

CookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
CookiesPolicy.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to run the site, improve performance, analyze traffic, and personalize content. This notice explains what cookies are, which ones we use, and how you can control them.

1.heading: 1. What Are Cookies?
1.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device by your browser. They help websites remember information about your visit. We also use similar technologies like local storage and pixels. In this Cookie Policy, we refer to all of these as ‚Äúcookies.‚Äù

2.heading: 2. How We Use Cookies
items: Required to make the site work (security, load balancing, session management).
Remember choices such as language or UI settings.
Understand how visitors use our site to improve performance and features.
Measure campaign performance and, where applicable, personalize content.

3.heading: 3. Cookies We May Set
items: Keeps you logged in and maintains session state. Essential. Expires at session end or within a short period.
Stores your cookie preferences. Essential. Expires in up to 12 months.
Collects aggregated usage metrics (page views, referrers). Analytics. Typical expiry 1‚Äì24 months.

4.heading: 4. Third-Party Cookies
4.text: We may use third-party analytics and tools that set cookies when you visit our site. These providers have their own privacy policies and may process data outside your country. Examples include analytics platforms and performance monitoring tools.

5.heading: 5. Your Choices and Controls
items: You can accept or reject non-essential cookies when first visiting the site or by revisiting your preferences.
Most browsers let you block or delete cookies. Blocking some cookies may impact site functionality.
Our site may not respond to DNT signals due to lack of a standard response. You can still manage cookies via the options above.

6.heading: 6. Data Retention
6.text: Cookie lifetimes vary by type and purpose. We keep cookie data only as long as necessary for the stated purpose or as required by law.

7.heading: 7. Changes to This Cookie Policy
7.text: We may update this notice to reflect changes to our cookies or legal requirements. We will post updates here and revise the ‚ÄúLast updated‚Äù date.

8.heading: 8. Contact
8.text: If you have questions about our use of cookies or your choices, contact us at info@appstractlabs.com.
